newsitem.title: USA: Butler National sees higher FY97 sales.
newsitem.headline: Butler National sees higher FY97 sales.

text.p: Butler National Corp said Tuesday it expects sales for fiscal 1997 ending next April to be above the $17 million posted in fiscal 1996.

New Florida waste water monitoring contracts for its Butler National Services Inc subsidiary "should allow Butler National Services Inc to make a significant contribution to a record 1997 fiscal year for Butler National," President Clark Stewart said in a statement.
A company spokesman later clarified that the "record year" referred to revenues.
The new Florida contracts for wastewater pumping station monitoring equipment and services total more than $500,000, the company said.
